Reviews.Title: Best camera!
Reviews.Author: Henry VP "HVP"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera a little hesitant cause it a good chunk of money but I couldn't be more happy with this camera, beautiful pictures, the kit come with all you can need, good quality bonus items. Now all i need is a wide angle lens, perhaps a flash and I'm set for a very long time and proud to show off with it.

Reviews.Title: Very, very nice
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: This camera is GREAT!  I love it, and I'll love it even more when I take the time to learn how to use it better.  The extra things it came with are nice, but I didn't need all of them.  Overall though, it's a great deal.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
Improved EOS Full HD Movie mode with manual exposure control, expanded recording with new Movie Digital zoom
3.0-inch Vari-Angle Clear View LCD; Built-in flash; Full HD movie mode at 1920 x 1080 resolution
Compatible with full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses
Free Shipping! Brand New w/All Supplied Accessories
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera (Body Only) and DIGIC 4 Imaging + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + TWO Extended Life LPE8 Batteries + Ac/Dc Rapid Charger + Deluxe Case w/Strap + Full Size Tripod + Memory Card Wallet + USB Card Reader + Accessory Saver Bundle!
